channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bridleway from Far Stanley up Stanley Hill blocked by fallen tree., 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is over the bridleway. It is passable (although not for horses or cyclists). In my estimation the maximum diameter of the trunks is 15cm. Possibly a job for CVW.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light number 1 in Bradshaw Close Longlevens is permanently out., 2nd July
item.description:
Bradshaw Close outside number house number 17
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bradshaw Close, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Visibility poor when exiting onto Two Hedges Rd because of uncut verges both sides, 2nd July
item.description:
At the end of Brittania Way, on either side of the road, and entering Two Hedges Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed bump not marked, 2nd July
item.description:
The speed bumps at this location next to St Faith’s care home are not marked and very hard to see on approach (as well as being degraded, with potholes forming). The ones further towards Gloucester Road are marked properly so these should be as well
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Broken branches fallen on pavement in Queen’s Road, 2nd July
item.description:
Some branches have dropped from a tree in the pavement along Queen’s Road in the position indicated and are blocking the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: The pipe under the road opposite Green Cottage is blocked and causing properties to flood., 2nd July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 2nd July

item.title: Tree with solid overhanging limbs which have cracked the windscreen on the top deck of a bus operating service 97 to Cheltenham at 12:06 on 02/07/2025, 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is located in Station Road, Churchdown about 50 metres south east of the bus stop shelter named Community Centre (bus stop id is glodjtmt). what3words location is spaces.cheetahs.merge. It is the first in a line of trees on the nearside of the road leading up to the railway bridge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
